query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.OCNT_NUMB -- 수주번호 ,A.EBDG_MGSQ -- 예산차수 ,B.PSPID -- 프로젝트번호 ,B.KUNNR -- 납품처 ,C.NAME1 KUNNR_NAME -- 납품처명 ,B.BSTNK -- 현장명 ,B.ORDR_TYPE -- 오더유형 ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0100 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CODE_GROP = 'A03' AND CODE = B.ORDR_TYPE) AS ORDR_TYPE_NAME ,A.ESMT_TAMT -- 계약금액 ,A.EBDG_TAMT -- 시행예산 ,CASE WHEN AP.APPR_STAT NOT IN ('040', '390') THEN CASE WHEN AP.ADIT_STAT NOT IN ('040', '250', '290') THEN (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND USERNUMB = AP.DRAF ) ELSE (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND USERNUMB = AP.ADIT ) END ELSE (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND USERNUMB = AP.APPR ) END AS ADIT_NAME -- 결재자명 ,AU.CODE_NAME AS APPR_STAT_NAME -- 결재상태명 ,A.EBDG_MGST ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0100 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CODE_GROP = 'A02' AND CODE = A.EBDG_MGST) AS EBDG_MGST_NAME ,A.WRIT_DATE FROM TABLE ( SELECT MANDT ,OCNT_NUMB ,MAX(EBDG_MGSQ) AS EBDG_MGSQ FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND WRIT_DATE BETWEEN #WRIT_DATE_FROM# AND #WRIT_DATE_TO#
AND OCNT_NUMB LIKE '%'||#OCNT_NUMB#||'%'
AND EBDG_MGST = #EBDG_MGST#
GROUP BY MANDT ,OCNT_NUMB ) AS X INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0301 AS A ON X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.OCNT_NUMB = A.OCNT_NUMB AND X.EBDG_MGSQ = A.EBDG_MGSQ INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0304 AS B ON X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.OCNT_NUMB = B.OCNT_NUMB LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.KUNNR = C.KUNNR AND C.KTOKD IN ( 'Z001', 'Z002', 'Z004' ) LEFT JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0103 AP ON (A.MANDT = AP.MANDT AND AP.ADOC_CLAS = 'OB' AND A.OCNT_NUMB = AP.ADOC_NUMB AND A.EBDG_MGSQ = AP.ADOC_NTIM ) LEFT JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0100 AU ON (AU.MANDT = AP.MANDT AND AU.CODE_GROP = 'A01' AND AU.CODE = CASE WHEN AP.APPR_STAT NOT IN ('040', '390') THEN CASE WHEN AP.ADIT_STAT NOT IN ('040', '250', '290') THEN AP.DRAF_STAT ELSE AP.ADIT_STAT END ELSE AP.APPR_STAT END ) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B.PSPID LIKE '%'||#PSPID#||'%'
AND B.BSTNK LIKE '%'||#BSTNK#||'%'
AND B.ORDR_TYPE = #ORDR_TYPE#
AND B.OCNT_STAT = #OCNT_STAT#
AND B.KUNNR = #KUNNR#
ORDER BY A.OCNT_NUMB DESC, A.EBDG_MGSQ DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
